title: Oil Holds Four-Day Gain With Focus on US Blockade of Venezuela
description: Oil held a four-day gain as the US continued its blockade of shipments of crude from Venezuela.
content: Oil held a four-day gain as the US continued its blockade of shipments of crude from Venezuela.
